description: This file defines the LangDBEmbedder class, which extends the Embedder base class to provide functionality for generating text embeddings using the OpenAI API, specifically tailored for a language database context. It manages API configuration, constructs requests, and processes responses to extract embeddings and usage data.

classes.name: LangDBEmbedder
classes.description: A class that provides methods to generate text embeddings using OpenAI's API, with configuration options for API keys, project ID, and other parameters.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns an OpenAIClient instance configured with API key, organization, base URL, and additional client parameters.

methods.name: response
methods.description: Constructs and sends a request to the OpenAI API to create an embedding for the provided text, returning the API response.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Extracts and returns the embedding vector from the API response for the given text.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Returns both the embedding vector and usage information for the provided text.
